item.description:
Reality Check:

How the Facts of Life on a Tough New Planet Shape Our Choices

Important Note: CSWR events are free and open to the public, but seating is limited and reservations are required. Register HERE.

Monday, March 8, 2010, 5:15 pm

Location: Sperry Room, Andover Hall, 45 Francis Avenue

A presentation by Bill McKibben, scholar in residence at Middlebury College and American environmentalist and writer who frequently writes about global warming, alternative energy, and the risks associated with human genetic engineering. A response will be given by Daniel Schrag, Professor of Earth and Planetary Sciences and director of the Harvard University Center for the Environment.
item.how_to_find_us: No organizer will be present. See message board below.
item.name: Bill McKibben @ CSWR
